explanation:
code_hardening: Added a null check for the Marker itself and validated that marker.getSnippet() is non-null and non-empty before creating and adding the snippet TextView, preventing crashes and empty lines.
resolve_compilation_errors: Used fully qualified class names and referenced PokeFinderActivity.this as the Context to ensure the function compiles correctly inside the anonymous InfoWindowAdapter.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Set the snippet TextView gravity to Gravity.CENTER to match the title alignment, and only added the snippet view to the layout when valid snippet text exists.
refactoring: none.
misc: Kept the layout minimal and consistent with existing inline view construction style; no new custom API calls were introduced.
